text: To Have and Have Not is a 1944 American World War II romantic adventure movie directed by Howard Hawks and was based on the 1937 novel of the same name by Ernest Hemingway. It stars Humphrey Bogart, Lauren Bacall, Walter Brennan, Dolores Moran, Hoagy Carmichael, Sheldon Leonard, Walter Surovy and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1944 romance movies Category:1944 war movies Category:1944 adventure movies Category:1940s American adventure movies Category:American romance movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in Martinique
title: To Have and Have Not
